violation.title: User specific files should not appear in .gitignore
violation.message: .DS_Store is user-specific and should not appear in a project .gitignore. Consider adding it to the user global .gitignore instead.

violation.title: User specific files should not appear in .gitignore
violation.message: /.idea is user-specific and should not appear in a project .gitignore. Consider adding it to the user global .gitignore instead.

violation.title: User specific files should not appear in .gitignore
violation.message: .idea is user-specific and should not appear in a project .gitignore. Consider adding it to the user global .gitignore instead.

violation.title: Commented code should not be committed
violation.message: Commented out code reduces readability and lowers the code confidence for other developers. If it's common usage for debug, it should not be committed. Using a version control system, such code can be safely removed.

violation.title: Commented code should not be committed
violation.message: Commented out code reduces readability and lowers the code confidence for other developers. If it's common usage for debug, it should not be committed. Using a version control system, such code can be safely removed.

violation.title: PHP debug statements found
violation.message: var_dump() should only be used for debug, and not committed to the source code repository.

violation.title: Interfaces names should end with "Interface"
violation.message: Interface BladeExtensions should be named BladeExtensionsInterface for better clarity.
violation.context: /** * Provides 'features' methods that are usefull when working with Blade templates. * * @author Robin Radic */ interface BladeExtensions { /** * Compile blade syntax to string. * * @api

violation.title: Interfaces names should end with "Interface"
violation.message: Interface DirectiveRegistry should be named DirectiveRegistryInterface for better clarity.
violation.context: /** * Contains the logic for handling the configured directives and version overrides. * * @author Robin Radic */ interface DirectiveRegistry { /** * isHooked method. * @return bool */

violation.title: Interfaces names should end with "Interface"
violation.message: Interface HelperRepository should be named HelperRepositoryInterface for better clarity.
violation.context: /** * Used for storing instances of helper classes. * * @author Robin Radic */ interface HelperRepository { /** * Put a helper instance in the repository. * * @param string $key The accessor key

violation.title: Object parameters should be type hinted
violation.message: The parameter view, which is an object, should be typehinted.

violation.title: Unused method, property, variable or parameter
violation.message: This name use argument is declared but never used. You should remove it.

violation.title: Unused method, property, variable or parameter
violation.message: This name use argument is declared but never used. You should remove it.

violation.title: Unused method, property, variable or parameter
violation.message: This args local variable is declared but never used. You should remove it.

violation.title: exit() and die() functions should be avoided
violation.message: This line stops the execution flow, without explanation. If this is for debug, you should remove it. If this is to deal with an error, use exceptions instead.

violation.title: exit() and die() functions should be avoided
violation.message: This line stops the execution flow, without explanation. If this is for debug, you should remove it. If this is to deal with an error, use exceptions instead.

violation.title: Global variable or function should never be used
violation.message: ex() adds to the global scope. Prefer class properties or methods to let other developers know what this relates to.

violation.title: Web applications should contain a favicon
violation.message: No favicon found in the web root directory
